channel.title: Ambient Improvisation
channel.description:
Yesterday night I played a little bit with my new setup. It's two axoloti boards now, one for looping using @rbrt's blocks and for fx, in this case @johannes' grain reverb .
Here I feed my Zither, running through a guitar preamp with distortion through the system. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RN8muLcp53U&feature=youtu.be

item.title: Ambient Improvisation
item.dc:creator: @geecen
item.description:
@geecen wrote:

This sounds ace! I'd love to hear more, and maybe with different instruments too.

Read full topic

item.title: Ambient Improvisation
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

Yeah thx I tried to squeeze like every feature I liked from years of experimenting with different hardware and software into this. The cool thing is also that I can hook up different instruments to this via the small mixer.

So I want to make this kind of my main instrument using it also for more electronic club music like live sets together with ableton but also standalone for improvisation and more experimental stuff so there is some performances to come this year

Read full topic

item.title: Ambient Improvisation
item.dc:creator: @mtyas Matthew Tyas
item.description:
@mtyas wrote:

Sounds great, can't wait to hear you doing long performances with this setup, it gives you a load of possibilities and great sounds. Keep it up !

Read full topic
